package.name: blackboardletters
package.author: Jordan Matelsky
package.description: Blackboard or double-barred lettering in Espanso
package.title: Blackboard Letters

manifest.author: Jordan Matelsky
manifest.description: Blackboard or double-barred lettering in Espanso
manifest.name: blackboardletters
manifest.title: Blackboard Letters

value.readme:
Blackboard characters in [Espanso](https://espanso.org/), such as 𝔸 or ℤ or ℂ


## mnemonic

Type `\\bb` followed by the character you want to write in blackboard font. For example:


`\\bbA` → 𝔸

The `\\` double-slash is chosen to avoid this colliding with LaTeX commands.

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  - trigger: "\\\\bbA"
    replace: "𝔸"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbB"
    replace: "𝔹"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbC"
    replace: "ℂ"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbD"
    replace: "𝔻"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbE"
    replace: "𝔼"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbF"
    replace: "𝔽"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbG"
    replace: "𝔾"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbH"
    replace: "ℍ"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbI"
    replace: "𝕀"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbJ"
    replace: "𝕁"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbK"
    replace: "𝕂"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbL"
    replace: "𝕃"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbM"
    replace: "𝕄"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbN"
    replace: "ℕ"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbO"
    replace: "𝕆"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbP"
    replace: "ℙ"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbQ"
    replace: "ℚ"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbR"
    replace: "ℝ"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbS"
    replace: "𝕊"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbT"
    replace: "𝕋"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbU"
    replace: "𝕌"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbV"
    replace: "𝕍"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbW"
    replace: "𝕎"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbX"
    replace: "𝕏"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbY"
    replace: "𝕐"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbZ"
    replace: "ℤ"
  - trigger: "\\\\bba"
    replace: "𝕒"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbb"
    replace: "𝕓"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbc"
    replace: "𝕔"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbd"
    replace: "𝕕"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbe"
    replace: "𝕖"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbf"
    replace: "𝕗"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbg"
    replace: "𝕘"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbh"
    replace: "𝕙"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbi"
    replace: "𝕚"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbj"
    replace: "𝕛"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbk"
    replace: "𝕜"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbl"
    replace: "𝕝"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbm"
    replace: "𝕞"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbn"
    replace: "𝕟"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbo"
    replace: "𝕠"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbp"
    replace: "𝕡"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbq"
    replace: "𝕢"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbr"
    replace: "𝕣"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbs"
    replace: "𝕤"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbt"
    replace: "𝕥"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbu"
    replace: "𝕦"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbv"
    replace: "𝕧"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbw"
    replace: "𝕨"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbx"
    replace: "𝕩"
  - trigger: "\\\\bby"
    replace: "𝕪"
  - trigger: "\\\\bbz"
    replace: "𝕫"
